pillars.title: Integrated and Intersectional Health Promotion and Access
pillars.description: At Amkeni, we deliver a comprehensive array of health promotion and service options tailored to address the diverse needs of sexual and gender-diverse communities. Our approach emphasizes compassion, inclusivity, and professionalism to create healthier, empowered lives. Our HIV Testing Services (HTS) are quick, confidential, and supportive, empowering individuals to make informed decisions about their health. Alongside HTS, we offer STI detection and treatment, prioritizing early diagnosis and effective management to foster long-term health. Prevention is at the core of our mission. We distribute safe-sex commodities, including free condoms and lubricants, alongside clear and engaging educational materials that promote their proper use. Our Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) and Post-Exposure Prophylaxis (PEP) services provide long-term and emergency prevention options, ensuring access to lifesaving solutions. For individuals living with HIV, our Antiretroviral Therapy (ART) program delivers personalized care and adherence support, helping clients achieve better health outcomes. Our health promotion efforts extend to mental health and psychosocial support, where licensed psychologists provide individual counseling, peer support, and crisis intervention. These services are designed to support emotional and psychological well-being, ensuring everyone feels heard, respected, and valued. We also focus on gender-affirming care and holistic approaches to mental health. Our commitment is to offer accessible, inclusive services that empower individuals to take control of their health journeys.
pillars.highlights: Comprehensive health services tailored to sexual and gender-diverse communities, focusing on prevention, care, and mental well-being.

pillars.title: Strategic Advocacy and Justice
pillars.description: Advocacy is central to Amkeni’s mission of fostering an empowered, just, and inclusive society. We employ a dynamic approach to influence policies, shape societal attitudes, and create safe spaces for the sexual and gender-diverse community. Our policy advocacy initiatives work to influence legislation and institutional frameworks, ensuring the inclusion of marginalized groups. Through human rights education and security advocacy, we empower individuals to understand and claim their rights while building safer communities. Additionally, our legal and paralegal services offer critical support in navigating complex justice systems. Amkeni is at the forefront of public litigation, advocating for equitable legal outcomes that uphold dignity and fairness. By leveraging cultural and religious engagement, we challenge discriminatory narratives and foster societal acceptance. Our strategic communication efforts amplify positive narratives about the community, breaking down stigma and discrimination. We are committed to building strong partnerships and generating actionable knowledge that advances the broader movement for justice and equality.

pillars.title: Improved Quality and Sustainable Livelihoods
pillars.description: Amkeni is deeply invested in fostering economic independence and social well-being for sexual and gender-diverse communities. By offering tools and resources for self-reliance, we help individuals achieve dignity, stability, and a sense of purpose. Our income generation projects focus on group and individual ventures, equipping participants with the skills and resources needed to start and sustain businesses. We offer skills training programs, including vocational training, apprenticeships, and entrepreneurial mentorship, to enhance employability and innovation. Through scholarship programs, we connect individuals with educational opportunities that expand their potential, while exchange programs foster experiential learning and global perspectives. We also prioritize leadership development and mentorship, empowering individuals to become change-makers in their communities. Amkeni’s self-improvement initiatives foster psychological liberation, helping individuals overcome self-stigma, embrace self-efficacy, and build resilience.

pillars.title: Organizational Systems Strengthening
pillars.description: A strong organizational framework is vital to sustaining Amkeni’s mission. We invest in governance, operational systems, and resource management to enhance our capacity for delivering impactful programs. We emphasize governance strengthening by developing clear roles, robust policies, and effective coordination mechanisms. Our human resource development initiatives focus on creating a supportive environment where staff can thrive while delivering high-quality services. Amkeni prioritizes resource mobilization through diversified funding strategies, including partnerships, grants, and social enterprise ventures. These efforts are coupled with financial sustainability models that ensure long-term organizational health. Through monitoring, evaluation, and learning systems, we measure progress, adapt strategies, and maintain accountability. Our research initiatives generate critical insights that shape our programs and position us as a leader in our field.
